name: Jewel Match: Attack of the Clones
name_original: Jewel Match: Attack of the Clones
description:
Match jewels for a dollar.
Match jewels legally.
Match jewels originally.
Match jewels willingly.
Match jewels by the game's rules. 🏫

This is a match 3 puzzle game where you match jewels for a highscore.


I spent $157 to publish this. This is not my usual type of creation, but it is legal and therefore does obey this website's "legality over morality" mentality.
If you wanna help me get more commission art to use for fan games, or help me and my family out in general, you can buy this to support me.❤️
